entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 5. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle early this morning. Wind north 20 km/h. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 17 this morning and minus 12 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Friday 10 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 13. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light before morning. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 12 this evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Friday 10 March 2023
